doc.previous: In Brazil the Yawalapiti an indigenous Xingu tribe in the Amazon Basin practice a funeral ritual known as Quarup to celebrate life death and rebirth and also involves the presentation of all young girls who have begun menstruating since the last Quarup and whose time has come to choose a partner
doc.after: In Japan public baths are very common Bathing nude with family members or friends in public bath houses saunas or natural hot springs Onsen is popular  In Korea public baths Jjimjilbang are widespread and communal nude bathing is normal although nudity is not permitted in unisex areas
